DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , tolerability , antiviral activity GS-9857 alone sofosbuvir ( SOF ) /GS-5816 fix dose combination ( FDC ) adults genotype 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) infection . All participant monitor 48 week last dose monitor persistence viral mutation .
